a:r.a:t: Warren Hood, Chairman, CEO and Treasurer
Manufactures and distributes packaging products as well as forest and wood products and building and construction materials
Product offering includes multiwall paper packaging, flexible plastic packaging, woven polypropylene bags and specialty coated materials
Primary component of business focus is on pet care end market
Currently offers dry pet care packaging solutions with opportunity to expand into wet pet care packaging solutions

a:r.a:t: Opportunity to supplement existing pet care packaging offering
Increase market share in the pet care and livestock feed packaging markets
Consolidate manufacturing footprint and leverage global sourcing capabilities
Acquisition allowed Hood Companies to expand platform to execute long term growth initiatives
Acquisition helped Hood expand its paper packaging business
